definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Most of the aromatherapy carrier oils you find in grocery stores are not cold-pressed .
sentences.chinese: 大部分的香薰油母你觉得不冷杂货店喘不过气来。

sentences.english: You can try aromatherapy bath salt recipes at home as well.
sentences.chinese: 你可以尝试香薰沐浴盐食谱在家等。

sentences.english: You can also purchase aromatherapy diffusers.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以购买香薰扩散器。

sentences.english: The evening feast included diced fatty flesh of tuna fish and milk-fed lamb with herbs.
sentences.chinese: 日本提供的菜单显示，晚宴包括金枪鱼和香薰乳羊。

sentences.english: It is the first aromatherapy product of its kind.
sentences.chinese: 这是首个同类型的香薰产品。

sentences.english: Scented candles are great to give to the couple a day before their honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 香薰蜡烛是在蜜月前送给新婚夫妻的又一好礼。

sentences.english: Aromatherapy has been deemed as one of the effective health options in today's busy world.
sentences.chinese: 香薰一直当作一个有效的健康方案在当今繁忙的世界。

sentences.english: Calendula and the freshness of mandarin essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 金盏菊和清新的甜柑香薰油。

sentences.english: The smaller molecules emitted by aromatherapy nebulizer diffusers are more readily absorbed by the lungs.
sentences.chinese: 小分子排出风口香薰雾化更容易被肺部吸收。

sentences.english: Alcohols in aromatherapy bath body product works as antiseptic for the skin.
sentences.chinese: 醇香薰浴身体皮肤的防腐工程产品。

sentences.english: Groove in the middle infrared light, can put all kinds of essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 在中部红外灯凹槽内，可放各类香薰油。

sentences.english: There are many kinds actually and one such kind is the aromatherapy nebulizer diffuser.
sentences.chinese: 其实有很多种，其中一种是香薰雾化扩。

sentences.english: Never leave burning incense unattended. Keep out of reach of children and pets.
sentences.chinese: 请不要把点着的香薰置诸不理，勿让儿童及宠物接触。

sentences.english: The aromatherapy nebulizer diffuser also has a clear, blown-glass looking device.
sentences.chinese: 香薰雾化扩也很明确，吹玻璃看装置。

sentences.english: Below are some samples of aromatherapy bath salt recipes you can try out.
sentences.chinese: 以下是一些样本香薰沐浴盐食谱你可以试一试。

sentences.english: Classified as a refined, gentle and floral fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 被列为一份温柔，精萃的花调香薰。

definition: to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
Styrax officinalis or Styrax benzoin/benzoin resin (used in TCM)/Benzoinum
